scripts.format:changed: prettier -u --write $(git ls-files --others --exclude-standard && git diff --name-only --diff-filter=d HEAD | sort -u | xargs)
scripts.clean: find . -type d \( -name dist -o -name node_modules -o -name .turbo -o -name .next -o -name .output -o -name .nuxt -o -name .react-router -o -name .open-next -o -name .source -o -name .svelte-kit -o -name .tanstack \) -prune -exec rm -rf {} + -o -name tsconfig.tsbuildinfo -o -name coverage.json -exec rm -f {} +
scripts.build:watch:10m: bash -c "while true; do pnpm run build:watch & pid=$!; (sleep 600 && kill \"$pid\" 2>/dev/null) & wait $pid; echo 'Restarting...'; done"
scripts.test:coverage: turbo run test && turbo run collect-json-reports merge-json-reports report --filter=@fragno-private/vitest-config
scripts.ci:version: changeset version && pnpm update && pnpm install
